TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit LocalBuilder extends System.Reflection.LocalVariableInfo implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._LocalBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class LocalBuilder Inherits LocalVariableInfo Implements _LocalBuilder
public ref class LocalBuilder sealed : System::Reflection::LocalVariableInfo, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_LocalBuilder
type LocalBuilder = class inherit LocalVariableInfo interface _LocalBuilder

summary.span: 表示方法或建構函式 (Constructor) 中的區域變數。

span.span: Represents a local variable within a method or constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`LocalBuilder`物件可以使用定義方法。A `LocalBuilder` object can be defined using the method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立`static`方法 (`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 名為`Function1`所傳回的字串和參數類型。The following example creates a `static` method (`Shared` in Visual Basic) named `Function1` that returns a string and has a parameter of type . 在方法主體中，程式碼範例會建立物件，代表兩個本機變數，然後設定符號的本機變數的資訊。In the body of the method, the code example creates objects representing two local variables, and sets symbol information for the local variables. 此方法不會執行任何重要的但方法主體中示範儲存為區域變數，儲存的本機變數的常值字串及載入本機變數的參數。The method does not do anything significant, but the method body demonstrates storing a parameter to a local variable, storing a literal string to a local variable, and loading a local variable. [!code-cpp[LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo/CPP/localbuilder_sample_4.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo/CS/localbuilder_sample_4.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo/VB/localbuilder_sample_4.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否在記憶體中 Pin 區域變數參考的物件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the object referred to by the local variable is pinned in memory.

value.span: 如果在記憶體中 Pin 區域變數參考的物件，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the object referred to by the local variable is pinned in memory; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中不安全的程式碼，它可以所參考的 unmanaged 指標之前必須固定物件。In unsafe code, an object must be pinned before it can be referred to by an unmanaged pointer. 雖然已釘選參考的物件，它無法由記憶體回收移動。While the referenced object is pinned, it cannot be moved by garbage collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int LocalIndex { get; }
.property instance int32 LocalIndex
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property LocalIndex As Integer
public: virtual property int LocalIndex { int get(); };
member this.LocalIndex : int

summary.span: 取得方法主體內區域變數之以零起始的索引。

span.span: Gets the zero-based index of the local variable within the method body.

value.span: 整數值，表示方法主體內區域變數的宣告順序。

span.span: An integer value that represents the order of declaration of the local variable within the method body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引編號會指派給本機變數的順序在它們所宣告或發出，開頭為零。Index numbers are assigned to local variables in the order in which they are declared or emitted, beginning with zero.

span.span: Gets the type of the local variable.
The of the local variable.

span.span: Sets the local variable's symbolic information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法支援動態型別中定義的方法。The method is supported for methods defined in dynamic types. 不支援使用定義的動態方法類別。It is not supported for dynamic methods defined using the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用方法。The following code sample illustrates the use of the method. 這段程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example for the class. param.name: riid
param.span: 保留供未來使用。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: rgszNames
param.span: 要對應之傳入的名稱陣列。

summary.span: 將一組名稱對應至一組對應的分派識別項 (Dispatch Identifier)。

span.span: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是用於存取 managed 類別，並不會呼叫從 managed 程式碼。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需詳細資訊`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.

exception.span: 不支援使用 COM IDispatch 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

span.span: Late-bound access using the COM IDispatch interface is not supported.
